mapper.select: SELECT ftrCode , hospitalId , patientId , ftName , ftCode , ftrValue , pDoctor , ftdTime , adminId , ftrDate FROM ginuengh WHERE hospitalId = #{session.SID}
SELECT ftrCode , hospitalId , patientId , ftName , ftCode , ftrValue , pDoctor , ftdTime , adminId , ftrDate FROM ginuengh where patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO ginueng SELECT ftrCode , hospitalId , patientId , ftName , ftCode , ftrValue , pDoctor , ftdTime , adminId , ftrDate FROM ginuengh WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.select:
SELECT ftrCode ,hospitalId ,patientId ,ftName ,ftCode ,ftrValue ,pDoctor ,ftdTime ,adminId ,ftrDate FROM ginuengh WHERE hospitalId = #{hospitalId}
and ${sk} Like CONCAT('%',#{sv},'%')
SELECT ftrCode , hospitalId , patientId , ftName , ftCode , ftrValue , pDoctor , ftdTime , adminId , ftrDate FROM ginueng

SELECT ftrCode ,hospitalId ,patientId ,ftName ,ftCode ,ftrValue ,pDoctor ,ftdTime ,adminId ,ftrDate FROM ginueng
WHERE
${sk} Like CONCAT('%',#{sv},'%')
